name: dmeq

stmt.origin: 3imtr4i(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c0))))
stmt.pretty: 3imtr4i(c0 = c1, dom(c0)= dom(c1), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1)∧ dom(c1)⊆ dom(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c0))))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)))
-| wb(wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), wa(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → dom(c0)= dom(c1))
⊣ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→(dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1)∧ dom(c1)⊆ dom(c0)))
⊣ (c0 = c1 ↔(c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0))
⊣ (dom(c0)= dom(c1)↔(dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1)∧ dom(c1)⊆ dom(c0)))
